name: Lost King
description:
WARNING  ! This game contains gore, nudity, and violent content.

Story

Dixen who died because he accidentally made a deal with the devil. His soul was then summoned by a mysterious man and sent to another world where The demon of the contract holder is located.

When in that world Dixen met with the spirit of an earlier hero named Roven and he told Dixen that the King had summoned many devils, Dixen would know the answer if he managed to reach the top of the royal castle of Vereden.

Features
  • Recruitable Character
  • CG Collection
  • Different morning and night systems
  • Atmospheric music
  • Quest
  • Relationship event
  • Growing alliance
  • Glossary with lore and story
